## Summary
- What changed and why

## Type of change
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] CI/CD

## Validation
- [ ] `./gradlew check`
- [ ] Module-specific tests run
- [ ] API contract verified (if applicable)
- [ ] Security checks verified (FAPI/DPoP/mTLS paths if applicable)

## Checklist
- [ ] Linked issue(s)
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Coverage maintained at module gate
- [ ] No secrets or PII in logs or code
- [ ] Backward compatibility reviewed
- [ ] Repository structure policy reviewed (`docs/architecture/REPOSITORY_STRUCTURE_POLICY.md`)
- [ ] No changes in frozen paths (`archive/`, `temp-src/`, `simple-test/`) or approved exception documented
- [ ] No non-documentation changes in deprecated roots (`bankwide/`, `bank-wide-services/`, `loan-service/`, `payment-service/`) or approved migration exception documented
- [ ] Shared foundation changes (`shared-kernel/`, `shared-infrastructure/`) include ADR/decision update
- [ ] Module ownership impact reviewed (`docs/architecture/MODULE_OWNERSHIP_MAP.md`)

## Notes for reviewers
- Risks, migration steps, or rollout notes
